comments: This is Sum_{all n^(n-2) labeled trees T on n nodes} Sum_{1<=i<j<=n} distance(node i, node j).a(n) is the total number of all defects in defective parking functions of length n+1. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 28 2015
references: Winkler, Peter, Mean distance in a tree. In Computational algorithms, operations research and computer science (Burnaby, BC, 1987).  Discrete Appl. Math. 27 (1990), no. 1-2, 179-185. [For background information only.]
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..380
J. Riordan and N. J. A. Sloane, Enumeration of rooted trees by total height, J. Austral. Math. Soc., vol. 10 pp. 278-282, 1969.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k>0} k * A264902(n+1,k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 28 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
